channel.title: Veena Vijai on
channel.description: Recent content in Veena Vijai on

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please fill out this form to directly get in touch over email! Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Chapter I: The Grand Hall
item.description: Three hundred and forty-eight years, six months, and nineteen days ago to-day, the Parisians awoke to the sound of all the bells in the triple circuit of the city, the university, and the town ringing a full peal. The sixth of January, 1482, is not, however, a day of which history has preserved the memory. There was nothing notable in the event which thus set the bells and the bourgeois of Paris in a ferment from early morning.

item.title: Habit Creation: From Ideas to Experiments
item.description: In July 2019, I finally got my hands on James Clear’s Atomic Habits, a book around which there has been much furore. I was excited to read it, yet had a vague premonition that I would absorb the content quickly and forget it just as quickly, as with so many books I’ve read before (think Malcolm Gladwell). I sat comfortably in the library lawns outside Doheny Library at USC on a warm afternoon day and started off.

item.title: How to Build this Website
item.description: Install Go: golang.org/doc/install, unpack, export to PATH, and check go version Install Hugo: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/#source Export all required paths to PATH by export PATH=$PATH:<new_path>, /snap/bin, /snap/bin/hugo, /usr/local/go_install/go/bin Choose a theme from https://themes.gohugo.io/, check tags to filter by requirements Buy a domain from Google: https://domains.google/ Follow instructions on Hugo quickstart page: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/#step-2-create-a-new-site Copy config.toml from exampleSite (example site under themes -> ananke -> exampleSite) to quickstart Copy the contents of the entire layouts folder from exampleSite to quickstart Add sections manually by creating new folders (with exampleSite as reference).
